mapper.select: SELECT a.id, c.car_name, a.car_no, a.order_user, b.customer_name, b.customer_id, b.customer_tel, b.cuetomer_license_no, a.apply_time FROM car_order a INNER JOIN customer_info b ON a.order_user = b.customer_no AND a.order_state = 1 INNER JOIN car_info c ON a.car_no = c.car_no;
mapper.update: UPDATE car_order SET order_star_time=NOW(),order_state=2 WHERE id=#{id};
